Address.label: Address
Address.value: 200 EAST HARDIN STREET, FINDLAY, Ohio, 45840-3229, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: MPLX is a partnership that owns both pipelines and gathering and processing assets with extensive holdings in the Appalachian region. The asset base is made up of pipeline assets dropped down from Marathon Petroleum, its sponsor, and gathering and processing assets from MarkWest, which it acquired in 2015. MPLX also acquired Andeavor Logistics in July 2019.

value.name: Gregory Scott Floerke
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
